Package chess

Class Pawn

java.lang.Object
chess.Board
chess.Pawn
public class Pawn extends Board
The Pawn class represents a pawn chess piece on a chess board. It extends the Board class and inherits its methods and properties.
Author:
Pavitra Patel, Huzaif Mansuri

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid(Board[][] board, int initiali, int initialj, int finali, int finalj)
      Checks if the move is valid for the Pawn
      Specified by:
      isValid in class Board
      Parameters:
      board - the game board
      initiali - the initial column of the Pawn
      initialj - the initial row of the Pawn
      finali - the final column of the Pawn
      finalj - the final row of the Pawn
      Returns:
      true if the move is valid, false otherwise
